users.title: Registered users
users.d_login: Click this button if you still have an account and you want to connect
users.d_register: Click this button if you do not have an account yet and you want to request for an account creation
users.ok_register: Successful registration. You can now sign in with your e-mail address and password.
users.ko_register: Registration failed. The user is probably yet registered.
users.d_lost_password: Click this button if you still have an account but you do not remember your password. We will send you an email to reactivate you account.
users.d_lost_password_username: You must indicate your email address as a username to request for a new password.
users.ok_lost_password: Successful registration. You can now sign in with your e-mail address and password.
users.ko_lost_password: Registration failed. The user is probably yet registered.

fields.d_email: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
